page.title: 15My House
page.content: My house is called Scarr Cottage,but when it was built, approximateley 225 years ago it was two cottages.We think they were built on the site of another house called Pains Hall,and possibly the present chimney stack dates from the earlier house.It is a timber framed building with black weather boarding and clay peg tiles on a manzard roof.Since we extended the cottage in 1980 we have a large lounge ,dinning room,kitchen,downstairs toilet and upstairs we have four bedrooms and a bathroom.We have a lot of exposed timbers in the walls and ceilings and open brick fire places. Our furniture is cottage style,mostly antique. It is situated just outside the village of Cold Norton in Stow Maries.
